instruction: Patient concerned about the long-term effects and possible side-effects of taking atorvastatin.

attributes.comment: Concern about atorvastatin long-term effects and side-effects

instruction: Atorvastatin – patient currently taking (dose and schedule not specified).

attributes.note: Father has a history of heart attack.

instruction: Patient on atorvastatin; no muscle aches reported but notes increased fatigue after cycling last week; worried about long-term medication effects; clinician explained medication generally well-tolerated and will monitor for side-effects.

attributes.narrative: Patient currently on atorvastatin; denies muscle aches but notes increased fatigue after cycling last week. Expresses concern about potential long-term effects of the medication. Clinician explained that atorvastatin is generally well tolerated and will continue to monitor for any side effects.

instruction: Dietary counseling: reduce saturated fats and increase fiber intake to complement atorvastatin therapy.

attributes.comment: Reduce saturated fats and increase fiber intake to complement atorvastatin therapy.

instruction: Monitor for ongoing fatigue or new muscle aches; if symptoms persist, order liver enzyme panel and consider adjusting atorvastatin dose at next visit.

attributes.narrative: Monitor for ongoing fatigue or new muscle aches; if symptoms persist, order liver enzyme panel and consider adjusting atorvastatin dose at next visit.
